title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.25 - Appeal to commissioner of education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.25 - Appeal to commissioner of education

State Regulations

Any party aggrieved by the final determination of the city
board may, within 15 days of issuance of the city board's final order, file an
appeal with the Commissioner of Education of the State of New York pursuant to
section
2590-g
(10)(c)
of the Education Law. The procedure
on such appeals shall be governed by the provisions of Parts 275 and 276 of
this Title, including the payment of the required filing fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
